title: Build failure with --enable-werror on gcc-12
body:
### I did this

We noticed this in AWS-LC's CI run with libcurl where we compile with gcc-12. I noticed this probably didn't show up in curl's CI because it runs with gcc-11, so this is probably specific to gcc-12.

### I expected the following

I expected a successful build, but got a failure with `-Werror` enabled with curl
```
  CC       tool_setopt.o
In function 'find_tos',
    inlined from 'bsearch' at /usr/include/x86_64-linux-gnu/bits/stdlib-bsearch.h:33:23,
    inlined from 'getparameter' at tool_getparam.c:1688:38:
tool_getparam.c:1081:19: error: array subscript 'const struct TOSEntry[0]' is partly outside array bounds of 'char[8]' [-Werror=array-bounds]
 1081 |   return strcmp(aa->name, bb->name);
      |                 ~~^~~~~~
tool_getparam.c: In function 'getparameter':
tool_getparam.c:1264:35: note: object 'nextarg' of size 8
 1264 |                             char *nextarg,    /* NULL if unset */
      |                             ~~~~~~^~~~~~~
  CC       tool_sleep.o
  CC       tool_stderr.o
  CC       tool_strdup.o
  CC       tool_urlglob.o
  CC       tool_util.o
  CC       tool_vms.o
  CC       tool_writeout.o
  CC       tool_writeout_json.o
  CC       tool_xattr.o
  CC       var.o
  CC       tool_hugehelp.o
  CC       ../lib/base64.o
  CC       ../lib/curl_multibyte.o
  CC       ../lib/dynbuf.o
  CC       ../lib/nonblock.o
  CC       ../lib/strtoofft.o
  CC       ../lib/timediff.o
  CC       ../lib/version_win32.o
  CC       ../lib/warnless.o
cc1: all warnings being treated as errors
make[2]: *** [Makefile:1178: tool_getparam.o] Error 1
make[2]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
make[2]: Leaving directory '/home/ubuntu/workplace/CURL_BUILD_ROOT/curl/src'
make[1]: *** [Makefile:1579: all-recursive] Error 1
```


### curl/libcurl version

`curl 8.9.0-DEV (x86_64-pc-linux-gnu) libcurl/8.9.0-DEV AWS-LC/1.29.0 zlib/1.2.11 libidn2/2.3.2` (Tip of main/master)

### operating system

`Linux ba3d79f041cc 5.15.0-1062-aws #68~20.04.1-Ubuntu SMP Wed May 1 15:24:09 UTC 2024 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux`
